DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics ascend single IV dose ERB-257 healthy subject
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Safety Pharmacokinetics Ascending Single IV Doses ERB-257
DOC.criteria: 1 . Healthy men woman nonchildbearing potential age 18 50 . 2 . Body mass index ( BMI ) range 18.0 30.0 kg/m2 body weight great equal 50 kg2 . 3 . Have high probability compliance completion study . 1 . Presence history disorder may prevent successful completion study . 2 . Acute disease state ( eg , nausea , vomit , fever , diarrhea ) within 7 day study day 1 .
